name: Alpha Air, Inc.
about: Alpha Air, Inc., is Tucson, Arizona's premier non-profit flying club, offering some of the most affordable airplane rentals in the area. Operated by Ben Martin, the son of the founder, Alpha Air is committed to providing a supportive and reliable environment for both renters and students. Ben personally inspects the aircraft daily, ensuring safety and quality. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Ben is willing to go the extra mile to meet the needs of all members. Alpha Air stands out for its affordable rates and dedicated service, making it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots and aviation enthusiasts. Alpha Air is where your flying dreams take off with trust and reliability.
